definition.para: The person or the corporate body responsible for the textual content.

instructions.para: Input lastname, firstname or the corporate body name.
Use LC Authority File for form of name, if available.
Multiple names are okay; separate multiple names with a semi-colon.
If the Creator is determined from a resource other than the item, create a Note.
If there is no author, leave the field blank.

customization.para: Search for author name in Library of Congress Name Authority File; if record exists, transcribe name as it appears in the name authority file, including dates.
If no record exists, transliterate author name on title page using LOC rules.
Author names usually appear on title page after the following designations: el autor; kompuesto; por.
